text: (Maraṇitta) avarkaḷ annāḷil (camātikaḷiliruntu) veḷippaṭṭu(t taṅkaḷ iṟaivaṉiṉ) muṉ vantu niṟpārkaḷ. Avarkaḷ ceyta oru viṣayamum allāhvukku maṟaintu viṭātu. (Avarkaḷai nōkki,) iṉṟaiya tiṉam, ‘‘evaruṭaiya āṭci? (Eṉṟu kēṭṭu, aṉaivaraiyum) aṭakki āḷum oruvaṉākiya anta allāhvukkuriyatē!'' (Eṉṟu patil kūṟappaṭum)
